com.connectforever
Class OtherLocation

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      com.connectforever.OtherLocation

public class OtherLocation
extends Observable

Keeps track of the other's location by asking the WebAPI for the Location each minute.

Method Summary
static OtherLocation getInstance()
          Gets a single instance of the OtherLocation class.
 void startUpdating()
          Starts polling the webAPI for the other's location.
 void stopUpdating()
          Stops polling the webAPI for the other's location.
 
Methods inherited from class java.util.Observable
addObserver, clearChanged, countObservers, deleteObserver, deleteObservers, hasChanged, notifyObservers, notifyObservers, setChanged
 
Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object
clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Method Detail

getInstance

public static OtherLocation getInstance()
Gets a single instance of the OtherLocation class. N.B. If it didn't exist yet, the newly created object does not automatically start location updates!

stopUpdating

public void stopUpdating()
Stops polling the webAPI for the other's location. Has to be done manually from the onStop method in UI class.

startUpdating

public void startUpdating()
Starts polling the webAPI for the other's location. Has to be done manually from the onStart method in UI class.
